title: Jordan Peterson and the History of the Christian God part 2
description:
When Jordan Peterson talks to Celebrity Atheists about "God" what are they talking about? What are our assumptions about the Christian God and how did they arise? 

This is in preparation for more conversation about Peterson's Easter Talk https://youtu.be/xPIanlF6IwM

Am I a Christian? https://youtu.be/RIB05YeMiW8 
Sam Harris and Bart Ehrman https://youtu.be/1-n7EGoM18s 

Link to Part 1 https://youtu.be/3IJcjwEtHi4


Book of Daniel Playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLS_9gLx08z7R-_sKvibvr-7km6otYal43 

Book of Ezekiel Playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLS_9gLx08z7TapSwHFBAkaAlvrFVEf58q

Patreon link https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
